concept.title: History of paranormal investigation
concept.shortdesc: Paranormal phenomena have captured the attention of the public and the sciences in different cultures throughout various eras of human history. The history reveals that methods and technologies of investigation are similar to those we use today.

conbody.p: Investigating unseen phenomena has a long history. When the topics become observable, paranormal investigation comes under the realm of science. In the 19th century many scientists, including Marie Curie, were interested in the paranormal. The development of technologies like the telegraph and phonograph lead to questions about the limits of time, space, and mortality. Projects of paranormal investigation are not typically considered within the realm of the professional sciences today.
